findings.title: Avoid assigning to function parameters
findings.description: Assigning values to function parameters can lead to unintended behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Avoid using 'block.timestamp'
findings.description: The usage of block.timestamp can be vulnerable to manipulation by miners and other actors.

findings.title: number of tokens Minor
findings.description: The token's total supply cannot overflow uint256. OrchidDirectory relies on mathematical operations being unable to overflow due to the particular ERC20 token being used being capped at less than 2**128.

findings.title: Potential overflow due to uint256 values
findings.description: The code assumes that no before/after amount can reach 2**128 and no staked amount (or total amount for a given stakee) can reach 2**128, which may lead to potential overflows.
